title: How to Draw a Stunt Car

steps.headline: Firstly draw the lower body of your car with the wheel sockets .
steps.description: Make sure the body is fully round , no hard corners.

steps.headline: Now draw the upper part of the body the roof and the wheels.You can add any type of rim to the wheels.
Draw the headlight, the taillight and the spoiler.
steps.description: Make sure that the  style of spoiler matches  with the car.

steps.headline: Draw the doors and add detail to the roof section .
steps.description: Make sure the door does not look bulky.

steps.headline: Now add decals to the car,also add a fuel cap  and a carburetor to the hood of the car.
Color the car make sure it is a little colorful because we want to make it a show car.
The power of the car is its speed add a lightning to show that this car is a speed freak.

text: Firstly draw the lower body of your car with the wheel sockets . Make sure the body is fully round , no hard corners. Now draw the upper part of the body the roof and the wheels.You can add any type of rim to the wheels.  Draw the headlight, the taillight and the spoiler. Make sure that the  style of spoiler matches  with the car. Draw the doors and add detail to the roof section . Make sure the door does not look bulky. Now add decals to the car,also add a fuel cap  and a carburetor to the hood of the car.  Color the car make sure it is a little colorful because we want to make it a show car.  The power of the car is its speed add a lightning to show that this car is a speed freak.  Finished
